attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned ask the UK government to disband the Sustainable Development Commission (commonly known as the SDC) and redirect our tax contributions to the devolopment of cleaner fuels. 

The SDC has recently released a report called "smarter moves". The report is entirely one-sided and seems to have taken no evidence from the automotive industry itself. In fact the author/s appear blind to how technological advances are already reducing CO2 tailpipe (and whole life) emissions from the cars we are driving.
